## LinearCardContainer.shuffle() method

Shuffle a range of cards in this container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
shuffle(random: Random, from: number, to: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  random | [Random](./bge-core.random.md) | Random number generator to use. |
|  from | number | Start of the range to shuffle, from 0. |
|  to | number | Exclusive end of the range to shuffle. |

**Returns:**

void
